commandName.label: Command Name
commandName.tooltip: Name of the command as it will be used in chat

addMessage.label: Add Message
addMessage.tooltip: The response message to be sent by the chatbot when a timer is created

updateMessage.label: Update Message
updateMessage.tooltip: The response message to be sent by the chatbot when a timer is updated

deleteMessage.label: Delete Message
deleteMessage.tooltip: The response message to be sent by the chatbot when a timer is deleted

clearMessage.label: Clear Message
clearMessage.tooltip: The response message to be sent by the chatbot when someone deletes all timers

errorMessage.label: Error Message
errorMessage.tooltip: The response message to be sent by the chatbot when the command is used incorrectly

invalidMessage.value: invalid time format! please specify time as XXhYYmZZs
invalidMessage.label: Invalid Message
invalidMessage.tooltip: The response message to be sent by the chatbot when using an incorrect time format

existsMessage.label: Exists Message
existsMessage.tooltip: The response message to be sent by the chatbot when adding a timer that already exists

notFoundMessage.label: Not Found Message
notFoundMessage.tooltip: The response message to be sent by the chatbot when specifying a timer name that does not exist

timerList.label: Timer List Message
timerList.tooltip: Label for the list of timers

timerMessage.label: Timer Message
timerMessage.tooltip: Message to be sent by the chatbot when a timer has finished

useCooldown.label: Use Cooldown
useCooldown.tooltip: Enable global cooldowns for this command

cooldownMessage.value: Please wait $cd seconds before modifying the timers!
cooldownMessage.label: Cooldown Message

permission.label: Permission Level
permission.tooltip: Specify the user permission level required to use this command
